pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Facial Toner Soothing 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE KIND TO SKIN BEAUTY BAR SOOTHING FACIAL TONER 200 ML

Simple Soothing Skin Toner removes the last traces of make-up and cleanser and helps to clarify and refresh your skin, preparing the way for perfect moisturising. A special blend of Simple skin toning goodness containing Pro-Vitamin B5, Chamomile, Witch Hazel and Allantoin, helps to keep your skin toned and refreshed. This dermatologically tested and approved toner contains no perfume, no colour and no unnecessary ingredients so it won't upset your skin. Perfect for even sensitive skin. For best results: Apply generously to cotton wool and wipe in gentle upward movements over skin morning and night. Follow with any one of Simple's everyday moisturisers. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We've stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare products suitable for all skin types and as our product range has grown. For over 50 years, we've pioneered a kinder approach to skin. In fact, it's become something of an obsession. Over time we've really got to understand skin; what it does and the everyday challenges it faces. We've learnt that when something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. For more information visit: http://www.simpleskincare.com.au

Boxed Contents: 200ml

Size: 200ml

KEY FEATURES

• Removes last traces of make-up and cleanser
• 100% alcohol free
• pH balanced to work in harmony with your skin
• Chamomile gently soothes
• Perfect for sensitive skin
• No artificial colours, perfume, or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin.

Ingredients

Aqua, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Hamamelis Virginiana Water, Allantoin, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Sodium PCA, Glycerin, Pantolactone, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Citric acid, Methylparaben, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1,3-Diol, Potassium sorbate
